Text.Description: Fires {$Char.PronounPos} Aura in a wide short blast.
Turn into a cloud and hover in the air
Reduces {$Char.PronounPos} adversaries' flame by {$Char.ScoreValue}{!Icons.ScoreValue} each time.
Dead exiles that held a special connection to the rites.

Phantoms tend to be melee fighters, not caring for their lives as they are already lost. 
 
 {#TooltipBold}Cast: {#TooltipText}Throws Aura in a fast wedge shape. 
 {#TooltipBold}Jump: {#TooltipText}High-jumps over obstacles, rival Auras. 
 {#TooltipBold}Rush: {#TooltipText}Runs much faster for a short time. 
 {#TooltipBold}Pyre: {#TooltipText}Puts out 20% of the flame at a time.
Rites Masteries enhancing a Phantom's damaging abilites.
When casting, the aura is thrown further away.
Deals an additional 3 damage for every enemy banished.
Doubles the time that the aura lingers for.
Rites Masteries allowing the Phantom to be useful in banishment
When banished all of the Phantom's allies respawn timer is cut in half.
When banished all allies briefly gain infinite stamina.
When banished the banisher is stunned for 3 seconds
Once per round the Phantom can salute to revive a random ally, and banish a random enemy. \n\n {#StatusText} Press {TA} to Salute during a Rite.
